question: "Which composer wrote ""Night and Day"", ""I Get a Kick out of You"", ""Well, Did You Evah!"" and ""I've Got You Under My Skin""?"
api_result: The composer who wrote "Night and Day," "I Get a Kick out of You," "Well, Did You Evah!," and "I've Got You Under My Skin" is Cole Porter. He was a prominent American composer and songwriter known for his contributions to musical theater and popular music in the early to mid-20th century.
